title: Mary Tillman: "Boots on the Ground by Dusk"
description: Michael's conversation with Mary Tillman, author of "Boots on the Ground by Dusk: My Tribute to Pat Tillman." Original air date April 2008, the book was published on 29 April 2008.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Mary Tillman)
